Html: There are quite a few hard-mode items that are not registered as being hard mode. For example, the Pendant of Fiery Havoc (http://www.wowhead.com/?item=45133) is a Flame Leviathan Hard Mode Drop. However both the Armory and Wowhead is not registering this. So I'm asking is to have a way to manually force an item into a filtered section.
You can create your own filters or edit the current filters to add the specific names.
